name: Surgery Prep
summary: Help the narwhal get ready for surgery. Accompany them from the pre-op to the operating room. Earn stars by completing activities. It’s like a game. It also helps pediatric patients [10+] understand what surgery will be like to feel better about it and has been used in a hospital. A parent suggested that Surgery Prep should be available to all patients [10+]. Now it is. This is the first release with updates to follow. We welcome...
